metadata.description: He's now a Marvel superstar, as seen in the pages of the smash-hit MARVEL APES mini-series! Now, experience the birth of the Gibbon in AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #110-111 (1972) - also featuring the often-imitated, never-duplicated Kraven the Hunter! Plus: the Sensational Spider-Monkey stars in a story from AMAZING SPIDER-MAN FAMILY #1!
metadata.name: Marvel Apes
